 2007-10612007-06-27,  ,  INDUSTRY,  JUS,  , 
ActCompetition Tribunal Act
PrecisDesignation of the HONOURABLE SANDRA J. SIMPSON of Ottawa, Ontario, a member of the Competition Tribunal, to be Chairman of the Competition Tribunal, to hold office for a term of five years, effective June 10, 2007.
